      • unblind

                                           java.math.BigInteger N,
                                           java.math.BigInteger r)
        Function which unblind a message in the case of RSA blind signature
        Parameters:
        signature - The BigInteger signed by the authority
        N - The modulus of the RSA key
        r - The BigInteger used as blind factor
        Returns:
        The BigInteger unblinded
